document_data.name: Pazruki
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pazruki''' was one of three major groupings of the [[human]]s that lived in the [[Ama Basin]],{{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste|48}} in particular the northern part of the [[Koryaz Mountains]]. They were among the tribes mistakenly called "[[Tuigan]]" by outsiders following the [[Horde Wars]].
document_data.Territory: The territory of the Pazruki bordered the lands of the [[Fankiang]] and  the [[Issacortae]].
document_data.Description: The members of these tribes were usually slight and thin. They had straight black hair, but they usually sheared their natural hair off. Instead, the women usually wore wigs, and the men fake beards. The origin of this custom was unknown, but some speculated that it was to deal with infections of [[lice]].

Society.Religion:
The Pazruki practiced [[wikipedia:en:Animism|animism]] and did not have [[priest]]s or [[shaman]]s. Any religious ceremonies would be performed by the father of a wealthy family. Occasionally, however, one would feel the call of magic and go into the wilderness to become an [[wu jen]].

They also held the monastery of [[Palevash]] in high regard.
